snippet: The president ends up falling back — again and again — on the Barack Obama Defensive Offensive — which largely means, blame the Republicans.
abstract: White House Memo; Pres Obama's long-running strategy of blaming Republicans for the dismal economy he inherited may be wearing thin among independent voters; Obama has to walk a fine line when discussing the economy, asserting his own achievements while avoiding naively optimistic statements.
lead_paragraph: The president ends up falling back — again and again — on the Barack Obama Defensive Offensive — which largely means, blame the Republicans.

headline.seo: Obama Adds a Fresh Metaphor to a Familiar Campaign Message
headline.main: Adding a Fresh Metaphor to a Familiar Campaign Message
headline.print_headline: Adding a Fresh Metaphor to a Familiar Campaign Message
